name: @triyatna/n8n-nodes-warest
description: WAREST whatsapp unofficial rest api for n8n community node

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const path=require('node:path');const src=path.join('nodes','icons');const dest=path.join('dist','nodes','icons');fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});for (const file of fs.readdirSync(src)){fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,file),path.join(dest,file));}}" && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const path=require('node:path');const srcRoot=path.join('nodes');const destRoot=path.join('dist','nodes');const walk=(rel)=>{const abs=path.join(srcRoot,rel);for (const entry of fs.readdirSync(abs,{withFileTypes:true})){if(entry.isDirectory())walk(path.join(rel,entry.name));else if(entry.name.endsWith('.node.json')){const srcFile=path.join(abs,entry.name);const destDir=path.join(destRoot,rel);fs.mkdirSync(destDir,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(srcFile,path.join(destDir,entry.name));}}};walk('');"
scripts.docs:dev: cd docs && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && npm install && npm run build
scripts.docs:preview: cd docs && npm install && npm run preview
